description.narrative:
This project emerged from the risk assessment of the organizations FOPABU and CAFOB; and they expressed their needs to be supportedin order to acquire management tools and at the same time capacity-building. So, the objective of the project is to provide Cafob and Fopabu with organizational risk management and anti-fraud policies; equip them with the " Sage Saari " accounting system and support the launch of the GPA advocacy strategic plan.
beneficiaries: - 18 people from CAFOB and FOPABU. Two training courses are provided for all the staff members of the 2 organizations, but more particularly, the leadership structures which are in charge of implementing the policy and managing it. More specifically, these are the members of the executive committees (5 people per organization) as well as the key personnel of these organizations (Executive Secretary, Program Manager, Project and Finance Manager). - 2 people from the finance department of CAFOB will be trained in sage saari and equip this service with this accounting software. - 30 representatives of member organizations of the GPA and 10 representatives of technical and financial partners.
Results: - More commitmentof organizations to undertake actions aimed at mitigating organizational risksand personnel who are well aware, informed and trained in anti-fraud policy and in organizational risk management; - Anti-fraud and risk management policy documents are in place. - The finance department produces reliable reports through the use of Saage software. - The GPA advocacy strategic plan is launched and the partners undertake to support the GPA in its advocacy efforts for the benefit of peasant agricultural producers.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam Novib is one of the 17 national affiliates of the Oxfam International Confederation. It started life in 1956 as the Netherlands Organisation for International Assistance (Novib), and joined forces with Oxfam in 1994. Working together in confederation, the Oxfam affiliates can speak with one clear and compelling voice on issues of global concern: climate change, health and education forall, agriculture, trade, and conflicts and emergencies. Oxfam established this country office to support local organizations and projects. Through this local office Oxfam Novib directly contributes towards this project’s implementation.
